## Touch.TOUCH\_MAP variable

The TOUCH\_MAP lookup dictionary specifies additional touch events to fire, in conjunction with mouse events.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
TOUCH_MAP: {
    [key: string]: string[];
}
```
